Tuesday , May 20 , 2014 - Islamabad - Finance Minister Senator Ishaq Dar chaired a meeting here on Monday to review budget proposals .
Chairman FBR briefed the Finance Minister on the measures being considered for inclusion in the proposals , with the objective to broaden the tax base and encourage documentation of economy .
